plot: Interviews with Beach Boy Brian Wilson and his contemporaries outline the history of Wilson's album "Smile," a project some 37 years in the making.
title: Beautiful Dreamer: Brian Wilson and the Story of 'Smile'
plot_es: Interviews with Beach Boy Brian Wilson and his contemporaries outline the history of Wilson's album "Smile," a project some 37 years in the making.
original_name: Beautiful Dreamer: Brian Wilson and the Story of 'Smile'
plot_en: Interviews with Beach Boy Brian Wilson and his contemporaries outline the history of Wilson's album "Smile," a project some 37 years in the making.
